Success.description:
操作是否成功。取值：

- true：成功。

- false：失败。

EventType.description:
事件类型。取值：

- StatusNotification：故障通知。

- Exception：异常。

- Maintenance：运维。

NameDesc.En.description: 英文事件名称的描述信息。

Level.description:
报警级别。取值：

- CRITICAL：紧急。
- WARN：警告。
- INFO：信息。

403.errorMessage: User not authorized to operate on the specified resource.

404.errorMessage: The specified resource is not found.

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Code": 200, "Message": "success", "RequestId": "A6582C8B-E67C-4A19-BC15-EAEFEBDC7995", "Success": true, "Data": { "Resource": [ { "Status": "failed", "EventType": "Exception", "Product": "ADS", "NameDesc": "查询失败率高", "NameDesc.En": "High query failure rate.", "Name": "SelectFailureRate", "StatusDesc": "Operation Failed", "Level": "INFO" } ] } }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" 46350DCE-3399-473B-875F-1340DC97186C success Failed OperationFailed 插入失败率10% InsertFailureRate Exception ADS CRITICAL InsertFailureRate Failed OptionFailed 查询失败率10% SelectFailureRate Exception ADS CRITICAL SelectFailureRate Failed Operation Failed 磁盘使用率80% StorageUsage Maintenance ADS CRITICAL StorageUsage EightyPercentQuotaExceeded 超过Quota 80%事件 超过Quota 80%事件 EightyPercentQuotaExceeded:Route 80%QuotaExceeded CEN WARN EightyPercentQuotaExceeded:Route NinetyEightPercentQuotaExceeded 超过Quota 98%事件 超过Quota 98%事件 NinetyEightPercentQuotaExceeded:Route 98%QuotaExceeded CEN WARN NinetyEightPercentQuotaExceeded:Route 200 true ","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询系统事件的Meta信息
summary: 调用DescribeSystemEventMetaList接口查询系统事件的Meta信息。
